content.text: Hello! I am interested in learning more about you.
Hi! I am a huge fan of classic cars. I love the sound of the engine!
Me too! I love old muscle cars. I have a 1970 Chevy Camaro.
Wow! That is awesome! I would love to see it.
I will send you a picture. I am also a huge fan of baseball. I play recreational baseball.
That is cool! I would love to try playing baseball. I have never played before.
I think you would really like it. It is a lot of fun.
What is your favorite part about baseball?
I love the strategy of the game. I also love the competition.
I can imagine! Baseball is a very strategic game.
I would love to play you in a game of baseball sometime.
I would love that! I am not very good, but I would be happy to try.
That sounds great! We can make it a double header. I will bring my Camaro and you can bring your classic car.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I am looking forward to it
